title: nginxconfig.io
description: nginxconfig.io is an online configuration generator for nginx. Features: - HTTPS - HTTP/2 (Let's Encrypt, Mozilla SSL config generator) - CDN - www / non-www - PHP (TCP, socket) - pass to index.php (Laravel, Symfony, CodeIgniter...) - pass to index.html (Angular, React, Vue.js...) - WordPress security - security headers - rate limiting - expiration
